trans-unit.target: Contiene un set di <xref href="System.Web.UI.ServiceReference"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The ServiceReferenceCollection object contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference> object for each Web service that is registered in an AJAX-enabled ASP.NET page.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto ServiceReferenceCollection contiene un <xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference>oggetto per ogni servizio Web che viene registrato in una pagina ASP.NET per AJAX.</xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference>

trans-unit.source: Web services can be defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control or in an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> control.
trans-unit.target: Servizi Web possono essere definiti nel <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>controllo o in un oggetto associato <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: You can add Web services to the ServiceReferenceCollection object declaratively by adding one or more `<asp:ServiceReference>` elements to a `<Services>` element inside the `<asp:ScriptManager>` element on the page, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere i servizi Web per l'oggetto ServiceReferenceCollection in modo dichiarativo mediante l'aggiunta di uno o più `<asp:ServiceReference>` elementi da un `<Services>` elemento all'interno di `<asp:ScriptManager>` elemento della pagina, come illustrato nell'esempio seguente.

trans-unit.source: ``` <asp:ScriptManager ID="SM1" runat="server"> <Services> <asp:ServiceReference Path="Service1.asmx" /> <asp:ServiceReference Path="Service2.asmx" /> </Services> </asp:ScriptManager> ``` You can also programmatically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Services%2A> collection by using the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A> method of the ServiceReferenceCollection class.
trans-unit.target: ``` <asp:ScriptManager ID="SM1" runat="server"> <Services> <asp:ServiceReference Path="Service1.asmx" /> <asp:ServiceReference Path="Service2.asmx" /> </Services> </asp:ScriptManager> ```È possibile aggiungere anche a livello di codice un <xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference>oggetto alla <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Services%2A>raccolta tramite il <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A>metodo della classe ServiceReferenceCollection.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Services%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference>

trans-unit.source: Web services are registered with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control during the page's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> life cycle stage.
trans-unit.target: Servizi Web vengono registrati con il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>controllo durante la pagina <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>fase del ciclo di vita.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ServiceReferenceCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.ServiceReferenceCollection"> </xref> classe.
